section.title: Economy Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 3-star hotel accommodation, and a guided walking tour of Montmartre. Budget-friendly dining options available.

section.title: Mid-range Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 4-star hotel stay in central Paris, tickets to the Louvre, and a river cruise on the Seine. Dining at mid-range restaurants.

section.title: Luxury Package
section.p: First-class airfare, 5-star luxury hotel stay, private city tours, gourmet dining experiences, and VIP tickets to major attractions like the Eiffel Tower.
